## Install
```sh
$ npm i inlinereply
```
## Usage
```js
const Discord = require('discord.js');
const client = new Discord.Client();
require('inlinereply');

client.on("message", msg => {
if(msg.author.bot) return;
if(msg.content.toLowerCase() === "hello") {
msg.inlineReply("Hi!")
}
})

client.login("token")
```
